title: pvp.net patcher kernel stops working right away
body: I dont know whats up i have removed and tried for the past week even looked things up but cant find a fix for the game. the PVP.net Patcher Kernel crashes right out of the gate. Anyway to fix things?

replies.body: This error is usually caused by a change in security settings on your PC that's blocking the patcher from launching.  I suggest going over the steps of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access and get back in game.  Hope that helps!
i tried it but will try it again just incase
